title: At the Hotel: Services (Usefulness 8)
description: Traveler usefulness 8/10 phrases for the Services subcategory within At the Hotel. Includes 5 card(s).

cards.romaji: Intanetto o shitemo i desu ka.
cards.japanese: インターネットをしてもいいですか？
